author: Ben O'Donoghue
method: Put everything in a big jug and mix Add a handful of crushed ice if you like but Ben has his without!
ingredients: 1 litre/1¾ pint tomato juice,  1 bunch celery leaves (washed and picked from ½ a bunch of celery),  dash Tabasco sauce (to taste),  dash creamed horseradish,  dash HP sauce (to taste),  2 limes, juice only,  crushed ice (optional)
